com.threerings.toybox.client
Interface ToyBoxClient.Shell

All Known Implementing Classes:
ToyBoxApplet, ToyBoxFrame
Enclosing class:
ToyBoxClient
public static interface ToyBoxClient.Shell

Provides acccess to the context in which we're running, either an application or an applet.
